value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Now that we have all the children
together, we won't lose.$k$pCome now, everyone. This way.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Before01,Face|...$k$pWho are you?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Before01,Face|Who are YOU?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hold it right there, you two. You
should not be meeting each other
quite yet...$k$pThis way, Heroes of Origin! Come
and show us what you're made of.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE01_01,0|$WmMPID_幼少マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Before01,Face|You have my gratitude! Everyone
has been freed, and we have you
to thank.$k$pYou must be from...Askr, was it?$k$pThe world certainly is wide. There
are kingdoms I have yet even to hear
of—and powers yet unseen...$k$pAnd you... Y-your name is...
$Nu, isn't it?$k$pI know we have never met, and
yet...there's something so familiar
about you.$k$pIt feels as though we're old friends
meeting again after some time apart...
How odd.$k$pAnyway, thank you for helping
us, $Nu…$k$pMay our paths cross again!$k$p$Sbs150|
